messages.message: Hi! Looks like I'm still getting this same error while trying to use the comparison app (specifically while applying to an Apply Checkpoint step, but only sometimes). I upgraded the app to v3.0.1 and made sure all my golden and output field names matched. Does anyone have any other suggestions?

@Swathy N is _unreal_ and fixed the issue super quickly. It was 2 things:
1. dont have any files other than the ibdocs you want to compare in your apply checkpoint folder
2. to be safe, create _your own_ `filename` variable in refiner and use that as a comparison key (as opposed to using the default `FileName` variable)
Thank you Swathy!

Point 2 in the above should be fixed and here is the ticket for the issue (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/APPENG-1566). For now, we need to use the extracted field and also we need to have the same golden - run output field names if we are using apply_checkpoint
